title: RP not working
body:
So I sent a ticket to riotgames to fix my RP issues.

So If you read my ticket, I am a fresh lvl 1 account on League and I activated my $25 RP card. However even though it said that it was sucessful, I did not receive any. People told me its instant once you ''submit'' the code however my balance is still 0. Do I need to reach a certain level to allow RP usage? Do I also need to verify my account first before inputting the code? If so... does that mean my RP is lost somewhere since I did not verify first? Please help me!{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

There was an issue earlier with redeeming RP, if you've got a ticket open you should receive a response soon and the RP will be credited to your account.

Support is currently backlogged so responses may take longer than expected (48 hours+) please be patient, do not open further tickets and do not reply to your ticket until it is replied to as this only pushes you further back in the queue.
Thank you very much for your reply. I was freaking out a lot because my friend said it should be there but it wasn't. However your reply gave me relief. Riot Rocks!
Not a problem. Glad to have helped.

so all we need to do is wait? and for this problem i mean the rp system is down, do we get the skin or rp? because riot always giving skin rather than rp, but i purchase a rp rather than skin, and i need those rp to active my hex annie

My understanding is that support will provide you with what you have purchased, which is RP.

>because riot always giving skin rather than rp

Where did you get this information from? It is incorrect.
